quiz.text: Which of the following is NOT a characteristic of life?

choices: The breaking down of food only
All chemical reactions in the body

quiz.text: Which process is involved in maintaining a stable internal environment?

True or false: All living things must reproduce to stay alive.
True or false: Homeostasis means keeping conditions inside the body constant.
Name the two main stages of metabolism.
What is the ability of an organism to detect and respond to changes called?

subject: Biology New Course
topic: 1.1 Viruses, Classification and the Domains of Life

True or false: Glucose is a monosaccharide.
